articles.content: We all know that walking helps with weight loss and but a new study published in the journal JAMA Network Open claims that it has several other health benefits too. The paper claims that walking 8,00… [+2673 chars]

articles.title: Human pangenome boosts accuracy and reflects diversity - National Institutes of Health (.gov)
articles.description: Researchers compiled a set of reference human genome sequences—a “pangenome”—that represents human genetic diversity better than any single genome.
